text: Dil Bechara (transl. The helpless heart) is an Bollywood Movie which is directed by Mukesh Chhabra. The movie is based on John Green's Novel The Fault in Our Stars. Sushant Singh Rajput and Sanjana Sanghi lead the movie. The movie was initially titled Kizie Aur Manny. The movie released on Disney + Hotstar on 24 July 2020. This movie remembered as Actor Sushant Singh Rajput's last film. == Cast == * Sushant Singh Rajput as Immanuel Rajkumar Junior "Manny" * Sanjana Sanghi as Kizie Basu * Sahil Vaid as Jagdish Pandey "JP" * Swastika Mukherjee as Mrs. Basu * Saif Ali Khan as Abhimanyu Veer == Reception == ===Critical response=== Taran Adarsh gave it four stars out of five and called it HEARTWARMING & further added, "A beautiful love story. Sushant Singh Rajput is top notch, charismatic in light moments, makes you moist-eyed in emotional parts. Sanjana Sanghi is wonderful."
